subject: JUnit question
msgSnippet: Hi, We have a custom code which we are trying to migrate to JUNIT. The architecture is similar to JUNIT, but the test methods return boolean instead of void.
messageBody:
Hi,
We have a custom code which we are trying to migrate to JUNIT. The architecture is similar to JUNIT, but the test methods return boolean instead of void. So to call assert() methods i am ahving trouble. Is tehre a any workaround for that.
thanks
